com.googlecode.cqengine.index.support

Interface ResourceIndex

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DiskIndex, OffHeapIndex, SimplifiedSQLiteIndex, SQLiteIdentityIndex, SQLiteIndex

    public interface ResourceIndex
    A marker interface which indexes may implement to signal that they open resources which should be closed after each request is processed.
    Author:
    Niall Gallagher
